column4: Ideally everything I install should have an aqua theme to it. Don't ask why. I just find a burning need to aqua any skillable application/enviroment
Well, just got samba up and running on my new ubuntu system. I'm amazingly inpressed so far, and will be writing thankyou emails/donating monies as soon as possible
, I am in the same boat. I have been hearing so much about ubuntu lately I had to give it a try
, coming from debian it's not really that different...just more up to date ;)
